mean_cn: n. 公平，公正；抵押资产的净值
mean_en: the value of a piece of property (such as a house) after any debts that remain to be paid for it (such as the amount of a mortgage) have been subtracted
sentence: To ensure equity, the old millionaire left each son exactly the same amount.
sentence_trans: 为了保证公平，这位年迈的百万富翁给每个儿子留下了一样多的钱。
word_etyma: equi相等，平均 + ty名词后缀 → equity公平，公正
